content: the marsa sweater is an oversized pullover for extra comfort and warmth with a fun stitch pattern your little one will love it s knit bottom-up starting in the round once you reach the armholes the front and back are knit flat then seamed at the shoulders the neckband and sleeves are picked up and knit in the round full youtube tutorial available https //youtu be/fhmc4rqtpmi **sizes ** 12-18 months 2t 3t 4t **gauge ** 18 stitches by 28 row for 4 inches / 10 cm in reverse hurdle stitch **finished measurements blocked ** chest circumference 31 32 33 33 75 inches / 79 81 84 86 cm yoke depth 4 5 5 5 5 6 inches / 11 13 14 15 cm sleeve length 6 5 7 7 5 8 inches / 16 5 17 5 19 20 cm body length 7 8 9 10 inches / 18 20 5 23 25 5 cm **yarn ** 3 3 3 4 balls of lion brand wool-ease or 255 255 255 340 grams of worsted weight yarn that weighs approximately 85 grams per 180m / 197yd **needles ** -us 6 4mm 16 inch / 40 cm needles you can forego these if you choose to knit the neckband using the magic loop technique -us6 4mm 24+ inch / 60+ cm needles -us 9 5 5mm 24 inch / 60 cm needles **notions ** tapestry needle 1 stitch marker stitch holder or scrap yarn email kaaburaknits@gmail com for pattern support
